name: ImageSim Registration
description:
ImageSim is an online competency-based learning tool that helps health care professionals improve their diagnostic knowledge and interpretation of medical images. Improve clinical performance, gain Continuing Medical Education Credits, and create better patient health outcomes through an online competency-based course available 24/7.

Please note that we will not share or disclose any information to third parties in accordance to our Privacy Policy.

Register below in order to receive a code for a $30 discount with ImageSim.
synopsis: ImageSim is an online competency-based learning tool that helps health care professionals improve their diagnostic knowledge and interpretation of medical images. Register below in order to receive a code for a $30 discount with ImageSim.

name: Child Health Research Days 2017
description:
The 13th Annual Child Health Research Days (CHRD), presented by the Children's Hospital Research Institute of Manitoba (CHRIM) is fast approaching. For the first time ever, CHRD will be a three day event, starting on October 3rd and ending on the 5th.

CHRD will kick off with a public forum at the Canadian Museum for Human Rights (CMHR) discussing "Healing from Trauma". The second day will host a variety of presentations united by the common theme, "Pathways to Equity: Better Health for All Children", ending with a gala dinner and awards ceremony. For information and how to register, please visit chrdmb.ca.
